title: J.S. Bach - Brandenburg Concerti (Petite Bande) [chabosun]
description:
Johann Sebastian Bach - The Brandenburg Concerti (La Petite Bande)
Accent Records

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Excellent performances with original instruments and great recorded sound.
Kuijken has the Petite Bande use violoncelli da spalli instead of standard 
baroque celli, giving the concerti a brighter, more transparent sound.

No notes or logs are included. Apologies.

It is *highly* recommended that you verify this album with PGP immediately
after downloading it. If you don't know what PGP is or how to use it,
download GnuPG and learn. A brief run-through is included with the torrent, 
but you'd better do some external reading. In short, download the torrent, 
copy the PGP sig from freetexthost, import my public key (0x37921081), and 
verify the archive containing the album. Only an authentic copy of this rip 
will return a good signature--discard any torrent that fails.

PGP signature: freetexthost dot com slash 0vyaex6nx0

Post comments, send feedback, requests, criticism to chabosun at gmail dot
com (encrypted, of course).

Keep circulating the tapes. Seed at least 1:1.
